channel.title: UglyFeed
channel.description: The ugliest, funniest news you'll ever read!

item.title: Man Sues Himself and Wins! Judge's Head Explodes!
item.description: A local man sued himself for emotional distress and won, leaving the judge in utter disbelief and the audience in stitches.

item.title: Cat Becomes Mayor, Declares Naptime for All
item.description: A cat named Whiskers has been elected mayor, implementing a mandatory naptime policy that has the town in a frenzy of relaxation.

item.title: Invisible Art Exhibit Draws Huge Crowds
item.description: An art exhibit featuring invisible paintings has attracted massive crowds, with visitors marveling at the emperor's new clothes of the art world.

item.title: Helicopter Delivers World's Largest Pizza, Causes Chaos
item.description: A pizzeria delivered the world's largest pizza by helicopter, causing a feeding frenzy and traffic chaos in the city.

item.title: Robot Announces Presidential Run, Promises to Fix Everything
item.description: A robot named RoboBob has declared its candidacy for president, promising to eliminate inefficiencies and bring a new era of automation.

item.title: Alien Abduction Insurance Claims on the Rise
item.description: Claims for alien abduction insurance have increased dramatically, with more people reporting close encounters of the absurd kind.

item.title: Man Sets Record for Longest Burp, Neighbors Complain
item.description: A man has broken the world record for the longest burp, much to the annoyance of his neighbors who endured the 2-minute spectacle.

item.title: Giant Rubber Duck Transport Causes Citywide Traffic Snarl
item.description: A giant rubber duck being transported through the city caused a massive traffic jam, providing endless amusement for pedestrians.

item.title: Banana Peel Slips Lead to Ban on Bananas
item.description: A city has banned bananas after a series of comical but dangerous banana peel slips raised public safety concerns.

item.title: Man Weds Refrigerator in Frosty Ceremony
item.description: A man has married his refrigerator in a bizarre ceremony, declaring it the coolest relationship he's ever had.
